pageContext.claim: “Alec Baldwin, whose dying mediocre career was saved by his terrible impersonation of me on SNL, now says playing me was agony. Alec, it was agony for those who were forced to watch. Bring back Darrell Hammond, funnier and a far greater talent!”
pageContext.analysis: Critics and viewers disagreed with Trump's assessment of Baldwin's performance. Saturday Night Live's 2016-2017 season had unprecedented ratings. Viewership soared by thirty percent against the previous season. Plus, Baldwin won an Emmy for his performance.
